Sentencas: A novel modeling scheme of SOFC anode based on the stochastic reconstruction technique and the Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) is proposed and applied to the performance assessment and also to the optimization of anode microstructures.
Titulo: Micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell anode based on stochastic reconstruction

Sentencas: A cross-sectional microscopy image is exploited to obtain a two-dimensional phase map (i.e., Ni, YSZ and pore), of which two-point correlation functions are used to reconstruct a three-dimensional model microstructure.
Titulo: Micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell anode based on stochastic reconstruction

Sentencas: Then, the polarization resistance of the reconstructed anode is obtained by the LBM simulation.
Titulo: Micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell anode based on stochastic reconstruction

Sentencas: The predicted anodic polarization resistance for a given microstructure and its sintering temperature dependence are in good agreement with the literature data.
Titulo: Micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell anode based on stochastic reconstruction

Sentencas: Three-dimensional distributions of potential and current can be obtained, while and the effect of working temperature is discussed.
Titulo: Micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell anode based on stochastic reconstruction

Sentencas: The proposed method is considered as a Promising tool for designing SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell anode based on stochastic reconstruction
